title: Blog post end spacing and affiliate CTA link update

requirements.summary: Add end-of-post spacing and a final rug tufting CTA line with the provided affiliate course link on the blog post detail view.
acceptanceCriteria: On the blog post detail view, there is clear visual spacing (extra margin/padding) separating the final CTA from the rest of the blog content.
A final CTA sentence appears at the end of the blog post in English (e.g., 'If you’re interested in rug tufting, here’s a complete course—open the link.').
The final CTA includes a clickable link that opens in a new tab and points exactly to https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007.

file_operations.description: At the very end of the blog post content (after the conclusion and before the back button), add a final CTA line in English with a clickable anchor to https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007 that opens in a new tab (target + rel). Add clear visual separation via extra margin/padding so the CTA reads as the final element of the post. Reuse existing styling patterns and, where appropriate, existing shadcn-ui primitives already imported (e.g., typography classes or Button patterns) without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Replace the blog post detail view 'Explore the Complete Course' button link with the provided affiliate URL.
acceptanceCriteria: On the blog post detail view, clicking 'Explore the Complete Course' opens a new tab to https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007.
No '[PASTE AFFILIATE LINK HERE]' placeholder remains in the blog post detail view course button href.

file_operations.description: Update the existing 'Explore the Complete Course' CTA (currently using a placeholder href) to use exactly https://kramis-teppich.coachy.net/lp/rug-making-tutorial/?aff=lishayK007 while keeping new-tab behavior (target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer") intact.
